segments.text: I'm watching two children attempting a daring feat in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing a stool, precariously balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed, making the stool look very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a 'COOKIE JAR' in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing by, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, palm open, in clear anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a sneaky operation they have going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't tip over with him on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be a terrible fall for the poor boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually a bit amusing, despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're getting away with it, for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, to be young and so daring for a cookie!
segments.speaker: PAR
